item.title: WIP Character Creator
item.description: WIP Character Creator/Appearance system for my engine/game. You can adjust skin tone/paint colors, -/+ various body parts and sizes. The video is of my favorite player race, but there are others. 100% developed and ran in Linux. ;) #indiedev #indiegames #screenshotsaturday Variation Video From Tweet Character Create UI is currently done in imgui for faster development. Will have a pretty user UI later, but this let’s me and modders edit the UI while the game is running to prototype much faster.

item.title: Basic Night Sky Test
WIP RPG with sailing, procedural worlds, and mod support
item.description: This page has some tweets + imgur posts combined here related to first posts of WIP RPG. These were some of the media tests done for social media video uploads. Using these to test video via hugo now. WIP RPG showing scale of a “small” 8x8 island. SDF proxy shadows and other “far” LoDs only for now. I had to crop out 1080p from the 2k image to record for now, sorry.

item.title: Lighting Model Tweet
item.description: Back to my take on OrenNayar/Beckmann (needs better energy conservation) Player Hus generation from floor plans (line art,multi-floor) New attachment system replaces all use of old one No work on hybrid shadows yet #screenshotsaturday Yeah, the mage with horns is using the Burley with GGX I tried for a bit and tossed. I like the highlights of my old 2-pass better but needs work to avoid getting too hot.
